评论详情: Grey Open Back Top ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) I’m obsessed with this grey open-back top! I wore it to the Dreamville Music Festival, and it was the perfect combination of comfy and stylish. The open back adds such a cool, breezy touch while keeping it casual and fun. The fabric is soft and breathable, so I stayed cool in the heat, and I got tons of compliments on the unique design. It’s super versatile too – I paired it with high-waisted shorts, but I can easily see it working with skirts or jeans. Perfect for any event where you want to look cute but still feel comfortable and free-spirited. Definitely a must-have for festival season!
